resources.string:
SELECT 
 (select waretypename from sawaretype where rtrim(sawaretype.[waretypeid]) = rtrim(sawarecode.[waretypeid])) waretypename, 
 (select count(warecode) from sawarecode b where rtrim(b.id) = rtrim(sawarecode.[id])) ware_all, 
 count(distinct saindent.[warecode]) ware_cnt, 
 sum(saindent.[warenum]) ware_num, 
 sum(sawarecode.[retailprice]*saindent.[warenum]) price 
 from sawarecode 
 left join saindent 
 on rtrim(sawarecode.warecode) = rtrim(saindent.warecode) 
 group by sawarecode.[waretypeid]
select count(distinct warecode) ware_cnt from sawarecode
select sum(sawarecode.[retailprice]*saindent.[warenum]) price from saindent, sawarecode where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode

CREATE VIEW view_ord_list AS SELECT A.departcode,A.warecode,a.colorcode,A.sizecode,sum(A.amount) amount,sum(a.money) money From ( Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'01\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s01) Amount, Sum(s01)*sawarecode.retailprice Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s01 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'02\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s02) Amount, Sum(s02*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s02 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'03\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s03) Amount, Sum(s03*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s03 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show= \'04\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s04) Amount, Sum(s04*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s04 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'05\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s05) Amount, Sum(s05*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s05 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'06\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s06) Amount, Sum(s06*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s06 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'07\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s07) Amount, Sum(s07*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s07 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'08\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s08) Amount, Sum(s08*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s08 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'09\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s09) Amount, Sum(s09*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s09 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'10\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s10) Amount, Sum(s10*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s10 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'11\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s11) Amount, Sum(s11*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s11 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'12\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s12) Amount, Sum(s12*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s13 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'14\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s14) Amount, Sum(s14*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s14 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'15\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s15) Amount, Sum(s15*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = (select size from showsize where show = \'16\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s16) Amount, Sum(s16*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s16 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'17\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s17) Amount, Sum(s17*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s17 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s18 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'19\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s19) Amount, Sum(s19*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s19 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag UNION ALL Select saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode, (select size from showsize where show = \'20\' and type = sawarecode.flag) sizecode, Sum(s20) Amount, Sum(s20*sawarecode.retailprice ) Money From saindent,sawarecode Where saindent.warecode = sawarecode.warecode And saindent.s20 > 0 group by saindent.departcode,saindent.warecode,saindent.ColorCode,sawarecode.flag ) A GROUP BY A.departcode,A.warecode,A.colorcode,A.sizecode
